title: Cognitive Apprenticeship-Based Curriculum for Strengthening Clinical Pharmacy Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Targeting current practitioners, this program aims to deepen clinical pharmaceutical competencies within organizations, conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment. It is operated with a focus on summative assessment, emphasizing collaborative learning among participants.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core procedural steps using modeling techniques during real clinical case analysis
Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in patient counseling simulation performance based on coaching feedback
Learners develop the ability to self-directedly reconstruct complex medication interaction judgment processes through scaffolding
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
